abstract: Boston University beats Minnesota-Duluth, 3-2, in NCAA hockey tournament's Northeast Regional championship; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Boston University held on to beat Minnesota-Duluth, 3-2, in the N.C.A.A. hockey tournament’s Northeast Regional championship, sending the Terriers home with a berth in the Frozen Four.
snippet: Boston University held on to beat Minnesota-Duluth, 3-2, in the N.C.A.A. hockey tournament’s Northeast Regional championship, sending the Terriers home with a berth in the Frozen Four.
